lead_paragraph: Serena and Venus Williams advanced to the quarterfinals of the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla. Serena Williams, who has won the tournament four times, beat Kaia Kanepi, 6-3, 6-3, and will next play the top-ranked Justine Henin. Venus Williams beat 17-year-old Caroline Wozniacki, 6-3, 6-3, but Lindsay Davenport hit a bump in her comeback, losing to Dinara Safina, 6-3, 6-4. Roger Federer reached the fourth round on the men’s side.
